original_text: In the six hundredth year of Noah's life, in the second month, on the seventeenth day of the month, on that day all the fountains of the great deep burst forth, and the windows of the heavens were opened.
korean_text: 노아가 육백 세 되던 해 둘째 달 곧 그 달 열이렛날이라 그 날에 큰 깊음의 샘들이 터지며 하늘의 창문들이 열려

sentences.original_text: In the six hundredth year of Noah's life,
on the seventeenth day of the month,
all the fountains of the great deep burst forth,
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 깊음의 모든 샘이 터져 나왔고,

sentences.original_text: and the windows of the heavens were opened.
